mapper.select: select ID, SUPPLIERID, SUPPLIERNAME, ACCOUNTSET, DESCR, OPENFLAG, TOKENFLAG, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, TOKEN, SENDER, COMPANY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, ADDRESS, ADDRESS1, POSTCODE, TEL, EMAIL, FAX, COUNTRYCODE, OPER, OPERTIME, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, MABANGJS from DB_BIAOJUEXTEND where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
